QuestData.Title: Taming the Wilds
QuestData.Description:
As a hunter, you need a trustworthy beast at your side... or else these quilboar will slaughter you.
When you're ready, I'll teach you how to tame such a beast. Then you must find one to be your loyal companion.
QuestData.LogDescription: Learn Tame Beast from Austin Huxworth, then use Tame Beast on any nearby wildlife.
QuestData.RewardText: You've got a loyal companion by your side. Take good care of them, and they'll take care of you.
